Business expansion solutions

Grow your business with automated, connected tools that can help drive compliance, create efficiencies, and provide visibility into spending.

Contact us
See why business leaders are optimistic about the year ahead

In the past year, businesses around the world have shown great resiliency. Now, leaders looking to the future say they’re optimistic about growth and making investments to reinvent processes. Read the full EIU report and see how leaders are returning to a growth mindset this year.

Read the report Get the infographic

Best practices for businesses to reset and grow

The pandemic forced businesses to be more agile and open to experimentation. And many seized the moment to reassess processes and adopt new solutions. We recently partnered with Deloitte to explore how business leaders are preparing for the future and the strategies they employing to expand.

Get the whitepaper

Getting back to going forward

Businesses planning for the future are doing all they can to manage cash flow, get visibility into spending, drive compliance, and move forward faster. Read the eBook and see what steps your business can take to achieve its long- and short-term goals.

Get the eBook

Customer experience is unmatched with Concur. If I need any assistance changing travel plans, their customer service is always there to help no matter what time of day/night it is.”

SAP Concur user
Read the full review
See how SAP Concur solutions can help expand your business
Concur Travel

Simplify the travel experience, increase compliance, and control costs — all in one place.

Learn about Concur Travel
Concur Expense

Integrate expense data and allow your company to manage spending anywhere, anytime.

Learn about Concur Expense
Concur Request

Simplify and speed up requests and approvals, drive policy compliance, and take control of company spend.

Learn about Concur Request
Audit Services

Let our global auditors handle complex audits so you can maintain global policy compliance and scale without risk.

Learn about Audit Services
Intelligence

Analyze and manage funds with customized reports, dashboards, and an integrated view on spend.

Learn about Intelligence
Contact us to learn more about SAP Concur solutions

To hear from an SAP Concur representative, please complete the form or call us at 1800-1020-650.
